title: FontShop
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : FontShop**

FSI FontShop International ( [www.FontShop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/www.fontshop.com/)) was founded in Berlin in 1988 by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) and [Joan Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joan%20Spiekermann), who were then husband and wife. FontShop is the original font reseller in digital type history. There are 6 independent FontShops (licensors of the FontShop concept) in Europe, Australia, and the USA.

FSI produces the [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont) typeface library and publishes _[FontBook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontBook)_, the most comprehensive printed reference on digital typefaces. In 2000 FSI started a royalty free image company called [fStop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fStop) ( [fStopimages.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/www.fstopimages.com/)).

FontShop also produces the publication _[Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font)_.

In addition to [FontFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont), FSI sells fonts from the following foundries:
